name: Celestial Attraction
description:
Celestial Attraction is a cute side scrolling arcade game set in space. An intergalactic groom is late for his wedding and must take a shortcut through an asteroid field. Use the planets to destroy the meteors before they hit the star and avoid the fiery and icy meteors at all costs!

Made in 48 Hours for The Game Makers Toolkit jam 2021. All assets were made by us within the time frame.

Credits:

  • Adam Brady - Programming, UI and Sound
  • Laura Pennington - Art & Animation
  • Cian MacNamee - Character Art
